website_summaries.verdict: With the option of a high chair or booster seat, you'll get more for your money and a well-constructed high chair.
pros: Simplicity in design and use make this high chair an affordable but high-performing option
You can use the high chair until your child reaches 37 pounds
and the booster up to 60 pounds
3 recline positions and a removable tray provide easy access

website_summaries.verdict: A solid yet portable model with few known issues by a trusted name in baby items. Parents love its design and functionality.
pros: Surpasses competitors with impressive feature set: 2-in-1 chair and booster seat, comfy padding, fairly lightweight (17 pounds with legs)
Sturdy build, easy to clean, and can be used with or without legs
cons: The tray is a bit difficult to put on and take off
Stance of the legs is somewhat wide

customer_reviews.title: It is not safe!
customer_reviews.text: It is a complete waste of money. Nothing is important as being safe but this chair is not safe!!! It has no back support. I would need to get a better one. I can’t imagine a company or someone would ever manufacture chairs for babies or toddlers without adequate back support/frame. I am surprised that there is no recall for this product yet. See attached video.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Skin can catch
customer_reviews.text: Loved this chair until my baby was crying uncontrollably and realized she had a bruise under her arm twice. Always when I was setting chair from recline to upright. Had my husband inspect the seat and found that her skin had caught in the groove when positioning. This flaw has to be fix!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V

customer_reviews.title: Practical design and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and I am usually terrible at assembling baby gear. My daughter is 6 months old but I want to get her used to being in a high chair to eat. She can fit in it even though she's still small. It's nice to know this will last her for a while as she grows. I like that there are different reclining positions if needed. The tray goes on and off easily and the seat pad can be easily removed to wash. There aren't wheels but it's not at all heavy so it's still pretty easy to slide it or carry to where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very basic but perfect sturdy high chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair! Its simple, nothing to extravagant about it. And the price is just right. Buying everything you need for a newborn is already costly, in my opinion, you really don’t need an expensive high chair that offers 10 things in 1. This one is just right. It’s does it’s job, it has 3 recliners, for the babies comfort. And the tray is a pretty decent size, not too big nor not to small. I chose this one before of the price. I wasn’t looking to spend much so this was perfect. I must say though, the colors and the design aren’t exactly very appealing to look at. It’s not pretty. But that’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lowe Family

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for my 4 month old for a little while and it's decent. I'll update after a few months use. Make sure babys hands are on top of tray before you click it in place so their fingers don't get squished. I saw the review video someone put on here showing the back comming off easily, she didn't have the parts in correctly. You are supposed to put in 2 metal pins in the back and you can clearly see she didn't put them in. If they are in, it doesn't come apart. It works, it's ugly af though.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic high chair, which is fine. Easy to assemble, easy enough to clean. The legs are a bit out in an awkward position but that's for safety so the chair doesn't tip over. Not easy to maneuver and the one hand tray is difficult to get into place or even attached for that matter, usually takes me several tries which is annoying, otherwise a decent basic highchair that serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: NCP

customer_reviews.title: I am in LOVE! bumbo? what's that?
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this chair. He had a Bumbo chair, which is nice and has its own advantages.. but this is WAAAY better. Baby sits more secure on this chair, and higher so you can feed your baby easier. The tray is big and sturdy, that helps with baby learning to self-feed and finger-picking. Also, this tray is very easy to clean... contrary to the bumbo one, that one had a bottom cover that you cannot open and water gets inside. Overall, this is a great buy! Parents make this a MUST buy product.
customer_reviews.author: Nena Moondra

customer_reviews.title: Afordable Price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this back in November 2018. I paid $50 for this highchair and it seems the price hasn't gone up too terribly. This highchair was easy to assemble and to convert into a booster seat. My daughter is now 2 years old and I still use this product as a booster seat. It's also very easy to clean. The price is also affordable, which is a big factor. You don't need a fancy, high end, pricey highchair. This one is amazing and doubles as a booster seat so you'll get the most out of it. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Solid chair. affordable. reclining seat a plus
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair. Much better than expected. I was looking for something cheaper and this was a good price. Exceeded my expectations. Everything is built very sturdy and it all locks into place well. I wanted a big food tray that isn't too flimsy. That it is. The straps are secure and hold my baby in place. It was easy to assemble. I didn't buy it for the reclining seat, but it is a pleasant feature to have. I would highly recommend this seat. Only thing was that I originally wanted something more portable, which this is not, but it's still worth it keeping that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: RomaK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for such a good price
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this would be a get-me-by purchase but I was pleasantly surprised to see that it is really good quality and easy to handle. It has a wide base that takes up some room but it also provides good stability for the chair. It is easy to get my grandson in and out even though I have small hands I am able to reach far enough to remove the tray. I haven't had any bad spills but the little messes we have had are easy to clean up. Easy decision. I am quite happy and would choose it again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, easy to use and even easy to clean! My 6 year old helped assemble the chair- which req'd only some help from me! The best part is the ease to clean; the seat cover is one piece (so no rogue food bits hiding underneath) when a simple wipe down isn't enough the whole seat cover easily comes off and goes into the washing machine, even the straps easily come apart and can be thrown in the washer; air dry it all and the high chair is good as new! Light weight enough to move around the kitchen but sturdy enough for lil one to be unquestionably safe!
customer_reviews.author: MomofBoys

customer_reviews.title: Grammy approved!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my home when my grand bebe visits. I was searching for a second hand one but after seeing this Graco highchair that will also convert into a booster seat when the time comes it paid to purchase this model over buying a secondhand highchair. The price for used was only a few dollars less. I bought my daughter a high end highchair for her home, when she came to my house she was very impressed with all the highchairs functions especially for the value its a winner...Grammy approved!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Szamborski

customer_reviews.title: Affordable sturdy and right for the job
customer_reviews.text: It was the first highchair I put together. It was fairly easy to assemble. I drag it around the apartment to use. It has handles. It does not feel wobbly when I move it around. My baby seems secure and comfortable. I have a five month old. The seat reclines nicely for smaller babies. I am happy with this purchase it was very affordable for the brand. I like Graeco products
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is perfect. Easy to assemble, use, and clean. It’s perfectly functional and I love that is converts into a booster without the high legs. The footprint is reasonable so I have zero complaints about its full size. We got a warehouse deal so the price point was also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good simple highchair
customer_reviews.text: Good simple highchair. Nothing fancy, but you don’t need it to be. Easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: StacyJ2001

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this high chair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this high chair I had 2 lnes for each of my kiddos if I ever had another child this would be my go to high chair. The only thongs I DON'T like is that theres small openings for food to get into and it makes it a bit hard to clean. I love that the cover is removeable and washable rather than just having to wipe down the chair. Overall I would highly recommend this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof. Family approved!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair was put together in 15 minutes by my 12 yr old grand daughter! I love how easy the tray and seat are to clean. I use diluted dishwashing detergent on a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit upholstered dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: Decent high chair as a stand alone. However, the straps arent’ long enough to fit around my upholstered dining chairs..which totally defeats the point of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: JH0717

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and my baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this high chair so much! I also love how easy it is to take the cover off and it comes perfectly clean every time. Assembly was a tad difficult when putting in the metal pieces into the seat and it is a tad bulky to carry around my house but nothing to make a fuss about. Great quality high chair for the price point. Please make some cuter options for the cover though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It functions well and a great deal but not as comfortable as I wish it were
customer_reviews.text: It is really functional and works well for the price. I like the pattern we have as well, I just wish it were more comfortable. Seems like it is probably uncomfortable on my babies back- the seat cover is very thin and doesn’t seem to have any padding it’s just a cover over the hard plastic seat/ back. But for what it is, it does the job and the tray slides extremely easy which is what I wanted. I returned the jeep stroller because it was so hard to slide the tray on and off- this one works amazingly well for that.
customer_reviews.author: meltom88

customer_reviews.title: Straps will shrink in the washing machine
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and absolutely love it !!! However when I washed the cover and (also the straps), I went to put it back together and clip him in to feed him and straps don’t go together anymore. Never in my life thought they would shrink but they did. We are now in the process in trying to get new straps because we love this product. So just don’t wash the straps in the washing machine lol.
customer_reviews.author: BigShurn

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Highchair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandchildren to use when they visit. It is a very nice high chair. The tray is nice size, it is easy to attach and remove, and the chair straps are easy to work with when securing the child in the seat. I recommend this high chair. My kids' made a comment, "That's nicer than the one he has at our house!" We are happy with the appearance and the functionality of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Could not put on pr remove the tray for this high chair
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the chair I received was defective but the tray was IMPOSSIBLE to operate! I could not put it on or remove it. Trays on high chairs should be easy to operate, I could just imagine having a restless child in it and the tray not going on. I've had other Graco high chairs that had no problems but this model has a bad design. i returned the chair.
customer_reviews.author: mruya

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions lacking
customer_reviews.text: High chair is excellent quality and very sturdy. My issue is With the assembly instructions. The instructions say to push the front legs through the foot rest. This grossly misleading; I used a rubber mallet and a flat blade screw driver to assemble these parts. The screw driver is needed to depress the outer spring loaded detentpin. The mallet is needed to apply the required force. Other than that, assembly is straight forward. I recommend this product if you have some patience for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this highchair because it is the one my friend used with her now 4 year old who still uses the booster seat part at the table, and it has held up very very well. Especially for the price, this chair is all you could ask for. Very simple assembly, very light and easy to move around the kitchen. The tray is able to come off one handed which is great to get the baby out or in. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: melissa bauer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in my small kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great high chair and I'm so happy I chose this one. I put it together by myself and took all of 15 minutes. The cloth seat comes off easily which makes it so easy to clean. It also fits in my smaller kitchen perfectly! The only thing I wish it had was a cup holder, but it's not that big of a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great first baby chair
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to make this purchase at first because I need it something small enough and confortable enough for my baby. 3 months later I am happy I bought this my Baby is confortable eating in this she has enough space for her food and you can reclaimed it so your baby is confortable
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Stable & Versatile, & the Price is Right!
customer_reviews.text: We particularly like the solid feel of the chair. Brings our grandson right up to participate at our table. And when he's bigger, it provides the booster seat. Easy to assemble based on the directions provided. Clean, crisp "look". Large tray, and easy clean up of both tray and seat. Tray can be mounted with one hand which leaves the other free for the unexpected!
customer_reviews.author: Anne S Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week of use, it has done well. Easy to clean. Easy clip and release from the front, just make sure kids fingers are out of the way. I could see someone careless clipping their kids fingers. Maybe Graco can edit the design to cover the attaching bracket a little better so kids dont accidentally put their fingers in the way. Toddlers are unpredictable. But we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair, but had slight dents in the 2 that I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works great. Just not sure why each of the two we ordered had slight indention marks all over the tray. I guess for the price, the slight markings aren’t s big deal—- but we wondered if food/bacteria would settle in the grooves?? Amazon was great about taking them back and loooking into why that was happening.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: I have 2
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this chair as a gift 2 years ago. Ordered another one because of having another baby. Easy to put together, clean and use. Great for using as just a booster for toddlers. Reclines and has 6 straps for a secure baby. The foot rest also has convent slots for the other 2 legs for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: This product is not very safe as our broke almost 6 months after using it. The back rest can be adjusted and that’s what fell apart. They never liked sitting on this chair as the big bulge below the tray (partition) is way too broad. We had to throw the chair away as the parts started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sach

customer_reviews.title: 6 months with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Our daycare has lots of these for a reason. Inexpensive and does what it should with no extra featues. Back and table have some wobble and flex but it's taken some fair hits and never had a structural problem. Cover comes off easy for washing. Reclines enough for bottles. One handed table install can be fiddly but is handy when you learn where the rails and button need to be.
customer_reviews.author: DrMario86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect. I was looking for one with a large tray so that our suction plates could stick and the two high chairs we were gifted were too small. This chair is sturdy and the tray is huge. My daughter loves to sit in it too, whereas the other two we have she hates.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I like the nice big tray and the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far we are loving this chair. I have an 8 month old and he loves it as well. I like the nice big tray and the fact that the chair takes up space as if it were another chair for the table not a whole wall like some highchair. I will say ALWAYS buckle your child, even of you think they will be fine don't take the chance. If that gray doesn't lock into place I could see a child falling out easily. I reserve my 5 star reviews for products that really wow me.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: High chair
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have this on hand for when grandbabies come to visit. It is plenty sturdy and I think easy to clean. It's not too bulky to store. It doesn't fold up but the legs do come off for storage. I just keep it in the dining room excitedly waiting for the next tiny visitor!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy, neat, clean and cute! Had one for my son but it was damaged in our move so we ordered this one which is similar for my daughter and we love it just the same!
customer_reviews.author: Jess H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made not sturdy tray hard to pull off and on. Pay a small amount more and get a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice highchair for little ones. They do sit up a bit higher than normal, but its not problem at all. I like the way the seat cushion kind of wraps up on the sides so the food doesn't all fall underneath the cushion. Cleans easily as well
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this high chair for my daughter. She loves it! She especially loves the seat recline. She says she can put her 9 month old in the chair with his bottle while she cleans the kitchen. Additionally it sits up for snack time and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sontag

customer_reviews.title: Great product at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Needed an inexpensive high chair for my granddaughter who visits occasionally. Arrived quickly in perfect condition. Very happy. A bonus: the crackly brown paper surrounding the high chair box, inside the shipping box, was a wonderful toy for my rambunctious cats!
customer_reviews.author: malfoyfan

customer_reviews.title: Graco highchair/booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice high chair with a handle in the back to move it easily. It had good reviews and we add ours to them. As grandparents, we looked for safety and the legs are spread out to make it sturdy. Good price, too. Our grand daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Darbi J. Rash

customer_reviews.title: Five star. Ignore the one star review by Samuel.
customer_reviews.text: I would just like to correct the one star review made by Samuel. He obviously did not insert the metal pins in the back to attach it safely to the seat. The instructions clearly state to do this and the metal pins are attached to the front of the instruction booklet. This is a great high chair and easy to put together without tools. Great price too, for one that converts to a booster.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair
customer_reviews.text: A good and inexpensive high chair. As a first time mom, I wanted something durable and versatile. This highchair grows with your baby! It also converts into a booster seat. It’s easy to clean, the tray easily comes off and attaches on. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: mc.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3 month old granddaughter. Has great straps so she can sit up fine in this. I wanted high chair to convert to a booster. Most on amazon were well over $100. This one does everything I wanted and great value. Highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Used--Clean, No Defects, No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought this used from Amazon for my grandson (now going on 18mo. & 28lbs.) and there was nothing wrong with it, just the box. Still being used, No complaints, I love it. It's sturdy and I like that the legs are thicker than the some of the flimsy looking ones. Hope this helps!😁
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, directions for initial set up is not the best
customer_reviews.text: It is multi functional. It does the job. Being a parent is hard enough, I wish companies would create simple you tube videos on how to set it up. Third party reviews are nice, but I just a video that would speed thru the setup.
customer_reviews.author: Leon R. Situ

customer_reviews.title: Good high chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good all purpose high chair and booster seat. It was easy to assemble and disassembles for storage. We have this high chair at the grandparents house and the DuoDiner at home. This high chair does not have height adjustment, which is the only feature difference I really missed from the Graco DuoDiner.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Takes up too much space
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. But I absolutely hate how much the legs stick out (I know this is for safety so the chair wont tip over). It takes up a ton of space. I am probably going to remove the legs and use it as a booster seat. Other than the space it takes up it works well and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair and perfect price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair! There is plenty of room for my little man's legs and the tray fits in the dish washer for good deep cleaning days. It isn't wobbly at all either. The only thing is my husband seemed to have a little amount of trouble putting it together and he is working to be an engineer lol!
customer_reviews.author: Hailee

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I wish it wasn't so boxy. Hard to put on a normal chair. I like that everything comes off and I can stick it in the washer. There are a lot of nooks and crannies that need attention when you clean it. It gets hard to scrub. I took it outside and hosed it down with soap and a scrub brush and there was still stuff stuck on it.
customer_reviews.author: jessicabearre

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: love it. The pins that keep the back in place fell out and you have to buy them separately because Graco could care less. They really shouldn't fall out that easily but they did! So just an FYI. Great chair but maybe never move it or pay close attention to the pins.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sims

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for child care
customer_reviews.text: Have had for just over a month. They are used with children in them 5 times a day. I like the adjustable straps and ease of setting a child in them. They wipe down really well. I have not used them as a booster seat and most likely won't since I have other booster chairs. I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I tried some other brands, either way way to small or cheaply made. This is very very sturdy, solid, easy to clean, easy to take apart (portable for me). The only con: if it was a little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Highchair back is adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this highchair because it’s back is adjustable so I can slide my toddler in when he is being fussy and straightening his legs. This is actually the second highchair I’ve bought! The first was for my son and the second was a gift for my nephew. Would definitely recommend. I regret not buying this for my sons grandmas house.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Nice highchair
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my house so my son could have my high end Graco for his home. It works great. It is missing the wheels and extra tray to remove and wash, but it works fine for me and the price was right for an extra highchair.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi8020

customer_reviews.title: Good for visits to grams
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandchild. Easy enough to put together, very convenient that the legs come off for storage. Very wide base on the legs, something to consider if you have a small space. The pad is removable for spot cleaning, but I don't think I would put it in the washer and dryer. Overall pretty good, but the webbed harness straps are not removable, so FYI, clean off any spilled food before it dries, otherwise it is difficult to remove easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd highchair. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This highchair is amazing. Its XL, I use ut with my almost 4years old boy. He has sensory so its really hard for him to sit at the table and this chair its the only one that he could sit comfortably. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar A. Lozada

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves picking up food by herself.. and this chair comes with pretty big tray..i like this chair.. the seat cover is easy to remove for cleaning.. I usually wash it on regular cycle in washing machine.. and it’s been couple month, it still looks nice and clean.. i would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Neeru

customer_reviews.title: Mom of 6
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one one I've purchased. I have 2 little ones close in age. I love how easy this is to use and clean. It reclines too. I love the 5 point harness option so kids don't try to climb out.
customer_reviews.author: MLabistre

customer_reviews.title: It works for its price i guess
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixed feeling about this high chair. I dislike it because it occupies big space and the back support doesn’t feel like it is secure because it is only holding on two small pin kind of a thing under. And i like it because it seems pretty durable than other brands and my baby likes to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G

customer_reviews.title: I like that the chair does not take up too much ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the chair does not take up too much space, but the tray is a tad annoying because you can't set it down with anything on it. If you do, everything will slide right off. So, either take everything off before you remove the tray, or set it down with the leg separator hanging off the edge of something (but you should still be very careful).
customer_reviews.author: Smithette16

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair! My son just turned 6 months old and he loves sitting in in at mealtimes. It’s very durable and cleans easily with just a wet cloth or sani-wipe. I got a really good price on it and shipping only took a couple of days. I highly recommend this for any new parents!
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Boggess

customer_reviews.title: For the price of this high chair, you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this high chair you can't go wrong. It was super easy to put together and works well getting my LO in and out. The fabric is also easy to wipe down (haven't had the need to machine wash yet). I'm only giving it 4 stars because while it's a 3 in 1 there are no straps that allow you to strap it to a kitchen chair (unless I'm missing something). My LO is squirmy so that's my only concern, however when you have the legs on you don't have to worry about it. We love this high chair and it works great for us!
customer_reviews.author: sbx2

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the Graco name. It was impossible to put in the pins that connect the back to the seat, but also holds the back in place. After a few hours of several people trying, we ended up using zip ties for a couple days. Sadly, we are returning this high chair. Definitely would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chigham

customer_reviews.title: Good High Chair
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I bought a really expensive high chair but unfortunately my 6 month old can't use it yet because he isn't sitting independently. This interim high chair does the trick because it has a harness and it was really inexpensive. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Retail Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: While the pad comes off, the straps either don't or they're really difficult to get out. So you can wash the cushion, but the straps will still be covered in food. Also, the tray is either being used, or you have to take it off--wish you could pull it out a little more for ease of getting the child in and secured.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota, FL

customer_reviews.title: Good midrange high chair
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair. It fits well in our dining room in terms of the design and color scheme which I wasn't even trying to make happen. I like the 5 point harness and the reclining aspect helps a lot as we can recline our 5 month old after eating to relax or drink with his bottle. Easy to wipe. The only complaint is the fabric that the harness is made of is not so easy to wipe off as the seat and food gets into the ridges. But overall, great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Muna

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but still a great buy
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean, however the tray is not the easiest to put on and the whole thing is not the easiest to assemble. Nonetheless, it's worth the buy. Not fancy, but what's great is the different recline option.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this chair! So easy to clean, very light to move around, easiest baby item I’ve had to put together. My baby loves sitting in it as he eats and watches his learning shows. I was worried bc the price was so cheap vs other chairs that it would not work out but it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I got it for my grandnephew. I had Graco highchair for my daughter when she was small. This one doesn't disappoint. Same qauilty and easy to use. I love it. It. Awesome me happy to see my grandnephew in it.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn’t such a pain to send back I would. Quality is not what I expected. The back of the chair moves a little too much and the legs aren’t very sturdy. I would gladly have paid more for a chair that feels more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fold
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to clean. Secure for babies one problem, it doesn't fold! And living in NY apartment what I need is space. Anyway I have it already and the main thing is that now My baby have his high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, functional .
customer_reviews.text: Great highchair. It's plastic but looks so much cuter then other high chairs. Other reviews say the backn is flimsy, my sun it pretty wild and strong and the back does wiggle a bit but it wins slidenout iof place. The tray is large and easy to remove even with one hand. The buckles at sturdy and clasp e easily. We take off the legs and pack it for vacation. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: No Frills high chair, nice and simple. It is a bit bulky, but very sturdy. Assembly was among the easiest of all baby products we purchased. Latch system works well to hold infants in and everything about it, including the fabric, is easy to clean. Note on fabric, the fabric does not pop right off, but the trade-off is the kids not able to remove it easy. It takes less than 10 seconds for us to remove it and under 30 seconds to reinstall it (the clips on bottom are a a little more difficult for me (large fingers compared to wife) with the small clip.
customer_reviews.author: Trailboss

customer_reviews.title: Wide legs
customer_reviews.text: Removable & adjustable tray; adjustable chair back too. Cleanup is easy. I only have hard time w/ the wideout legs. Both my toddler & me get our feet caught in one of the legs. Other than that it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean high chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are super easy to clean, the fabric comes clean in the wash. Also very easy to convert from high chair to booster seat! Also love that the release mechanism is in the front and can be done with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. One hand tray removal is nice. I like the 3 point positions. Only 4 stars because I wish there was a little bit of padding on the seat cover. Great that it coverts to a booster once I don't need the high chair anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hoysradt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my order!
customer_reviews.text: I love the high chair! The color is beautiful and as long as you follow the instructions it’s easy to assemble. Parts are easy to remove to wash and clean. I really like that the seat reclines. Only downfall is if you want something that stores away or have a small space for it. Also the box came broken which damaged the tray. Maybe they should wrap it better.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: My little one was never able to get comfortable. The process of putting on the table portion ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews expecting a decent quality inexpensive high chair that would last us the next year for our 6 month old. What I didn’t expect was how flimsy the overal integrity of the structure was as well as how cheap the plastic back support was made. My little one was never able to get comfortable. The process of putting on the table portion might seem like a good idea on paper but in practice it became cumbersome with her little fingers always getting caught in between the chair and the clamps. We threw this thing out after two months and bought a Peg Perego Siesta and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best chair ever, one handed tray removal
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can remove the tray with one hand. All pro's, really no con's. I have two and both my sons love them! Easy to clean, easy to strap them in!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zangirolami

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It’s what we needed for our toddler. It’s just the right height and durable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It does what we need it to do. Of course the food is in the seat because it’s a baby chair! It’s just what we needed for our grandchildren when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Great quality, tray is a little hard to get off and on but overall it's a great purchase. Price is right in the "not too expensive" range and it works exactly how you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Comic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Graco Simple Switch Portable High Chair and Booster was a great baby shower gift that will grow with the little man. Good sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Gobin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to assemble and my kid who usually doesn't sit still, sat in the chair and ate all the food (and then ate mine)
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: and it's perfect. Our daughter has grown into it
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for months now, and it's perfect. Our daughter has grown into it, and at 1 year old, we can tell she'll still be fitting in this for some time to come. The seat cover is easy to wash, the tray is easy to take on/off, and it's easy to break it down for moving (we've taken it camping, both outdoors and to hotels). I'd definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to assemble and clean. Perfect high chair and works wonderfully specially for being an inexpensive option.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high chair for Grandparents house. It has all the traditional standard features, tray with fall through guard, adjustable back angle. The enclosed pad is ok, but not as luxurious as some more expensive models. It is very sturdy and stable which is #1 priority. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Once i had my husband put the legs on correctly and got the stupid metal pieces in, it's awesome! I don't think ill ever take the legs off after how long it took.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this high chair. When we first got it he wouldn’t leave it for an hour. Very comfortable, good strong straps, easy to clean, and amazingly durable. Highly recommend the chair for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great chair at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and so easy to pop tray on/off. I like how the tray has no grooves or cup holders which make it so easy to clean and wipe down. One has lasted me for two children and nearly five years and it's still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Swtvabrz7

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This chair is good. It's light weight so easy to move. Tray is easy to get off and one with one hand. Would be nice if it has wheels but it's still good.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great price compared to the stores
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to the stores. I like that the legs can be removed and you can use on any chair. I like the 5 point harness and that the cover is washable and easy to remove. Stubb my toes on the feet all the time. I don't like that the tray doesn't go back far enough in the fully reclined position. Other than that it's a wonderful chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sam :)

customer_reviews.title: Great chair that can change as a child grows up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this highchair! I strap the seat to the chair for my 2 year old granddaughter, and use the highchair for my younger granddaughter when she visits. Wish I would have found this chair sooner
customer_reviews.author: I😻puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this high chair, it’s simple and easy to clean, the hight is perfect for placing it next to the table so that our little one can join the family for meals. It fulfills its purpose at a wonderfully affordable price. It has adjustable back support which is perfect for eating or simply laying back to drink milk. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Iqra Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: I am over the top pleased! 1
customer_reviews.text: I am over the top pleased! 1. Easy breezy 10 minute set up 2. Extremely sturdy 3. Perfect height... it slides under my breakfast nook in my small kitchen 4. Huge tray for eating, learning and play activities 5. My 10 month old loves the 2 reclining levels. 6. This seat will grow with him through his toddler years 7. The cushion matches the colors in my kitchen. It is very easy to clean. 8. The tray is simple to adjust and remove 9. The straps are easy to adjust and very comfortable for the baby 10. The price fit our budget!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fold up with I don't like but its a nice chair. The tray doesn't slide in and out on it, you have to either take it off or squeeze your kid into the seat but overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yelle

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We have twins so we have two of these chairs and they are easy to clean and easy to put together. A wonderful price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair! It is so easy to clean the fabric comes off and is machine washable and the chair is super easy to wipe down with whatever you use to clean can use with or without the legs. Extremely durable!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

product_meta.title: Graco Simple Switch Portable High Chair and Booster, Zuba
product_meta.description: Color:ZubaA 2-in-1 high chair design is a smart choice. The Graco SimpleSwitch Portable High Chair, in Zuba, grows with your baby from highchair to booster. The baby high chair includes 3 reclining positions. The transition to booster mode is easier than ever and the built-in leg storage offers you added convenience when mealtime is over. It's both a great value and a good way to bring your little one to the family table. Do not force tray against child.
feature_bullets: 2 in 1 portable high chair that converts to booster when your child is ready.Maximum weight capacity: Highchair: 37 Pounds Feeding booster: 60 Pounds
3 position reclining seat helps you find a comfortable feeding position for your little diner; this is a feature that moms love when considering high chairs
Machine washable seat pad makes cleaning this baby high chair easy. To clean frame, use only household soap and warm water. No bleach
One hand tray removal makes getting your child in and out simple. Highchair dimensions (L x W x H): 28.5 x 23.5 x 43 inch. Booster dimensions (H x D x W): 20 x 16.5 x 15.25 inch
Built in leg storage keep parts together on this foldable high chair when you transition to booster mode
